summary.span: A data-bound list control that allows custom layout by repeating a specified template for each item displayed in the list.

span.span: A data-bound list control that allows custom layout by repeating a specified template for each item displayed in the list.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [数据绑定Data Binding](#data_binding) - [模板Templates](#templates) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是基本的模板化数据绑定列表。The control is a basic templated data-bound list. 它有没有内置布局或样式，因此您必须显式声明所有的布局、 格式和样式控件的模板中的标记。It has no built-in layout or styles, so you must explicitly declare all layout, formatting, and style tags within the control's templates. 让您可以在模板间拆分标记。The control allows you to split markup tags across the templates. 若要创建表使用模板，包括表开始标记 (``) 中，单个表行标记 (``) 中，并结束 table 标记 (`
`) 中。To create a table using templates, include the begin table tag (``) in the , a single table row tag (``) in the , and the end table tag (`
`) in the . 控件具有没有内置选择功能或编辑支持。The control has no built-in selection capabilities or editing support. 可以使用从模板引发到控件的处理控件事件的事件。You can use the event to process control events that are raised from the templates to the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## 数据绑定Data Binding 控件提供了两个属性，以支持数据绑定。The control provides two properties to support data binding. 若要将数据绑定到任何实现的集合接口 (如即，或数组)，或界面，请使用属性来指定数据源。To bind data to any collection that implements the interface (such as a , a , or an array), or the interface, use the property to specify the data source. 当您将设置属性时，必须手动编写代码来执行数据绑定。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding. 若要自动绑定控件与数据源表示数据源控件，设置属性设置为要使用的数据源控件。To automatically bind the control to a data source represented by a data source control, set the property to the of the data source control to use. 当您将设置属性，控件自动绑定到第一个请求上的指定的数据源控件。When you set the property, the control automatically binds to the specified data source control on the first request. 因此，不需要显式调用方法已更改的数据相关的属性，除非控件。Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the method unless you have changed data-related properties of the control. 一个控制绑定其并模型对任一数据声明和引用的其属性或数据源控件指定其属性。A control binds its and to either the data model declared and referenced by its property or the data source control specified by its property. ， ，和是未进行数据绑定。The , , and are not data-bound. 如果设置控件的数据源但没有返回任何数据，该控件呈现和不具有任何项。If the control's data source is set but no data is returned, the control renders the and with no items. 如果数据源`null`，则不呈现。If the data source is `null`, the is not rendered. ## 模板Templates 至少每隔控件中必须定义。At a minimum, every control must define an . 但是，在下表中所述的其他可选模板可用于自定义列表的外观。However, other optional templates described in the following table can be used to customize the appearance of the list. |模板名称Template name|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| ||定义的内容和列表中的项的布局。Defines the content and layout of items within the list. 此模板是必需的。This template is required.| ||如果定义，可以确定的内容和布局交替 （从零开始为奇数索引） 的项。If defined, determines the content and layout of alternating (zero-based odd-indexed) items. 如果未定义，使用。If not defined, is used.| ||如果定义，将呈现的项 （和交替项） 之间。If defined, is rendered between items (and alternating items). 如果未定义，则不会呈现分隔符。If not defined, a separator is not rendered.| ||如果定义，可以确定的内容和列表标头的布局。If defined, determines the content and layout of the list header. 如果未定义，则不会呈现一个标头。If not defined, a header is not rendered.| ||如果定义，可以确定的内容和列表页脚的布局。If defined, determines the content and layout of the list footer. 如果未定义，则不会呈现一个页脚。If not defined, a footer is not rendered.| ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples Visual Studio Web 站点项目的源代码是可随附于本主题：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192873)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192873). 下面的代码示例演示如何使用两个简单页面上的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use two simple controls on a page. 属性用于指定的数据源控件。The property is used to specify the data source for the control. 第一个表中显示它的项第二个以逗号分隔的列表中显示它的项。The first displays its items in a table; the second displays its items in a comma-separated list. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Repeater Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Repeater Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Repeater Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Repeater Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的数据源控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data source for a control. 属性设置为属性的控件，用于检索数据。The property is set to the property of the control used to retrieve the data. 加载页面时，控件自动绑定到指定的数据源控件和数据显示给用户。When the page is loaded, the control automatically binds to the data source specified by the control and the data is displayed to the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[Repeater.DataSourceID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Repeater.DataSourceID/CS/repeater.datasourceidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Repeater.DataSourceID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Repeater.DataSourceID/VB/repeater.datasourceidvb.aspx#1)]

ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用若要显示的交替项中具有粗体的字体的浅蓝色单元格的控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the to display alternating items of the control in a light blue cell with bold font. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将指定的数据源绑定属性设置为控件。Use the method to bind the data source specified by the property to the control. 将绑定到的数据源时控件中显示控件，数据源中的信息。When you bind a data source to the control, the information in the data source is displayed in the control. 方法通常还用于同步的数据源和数据列表控件后更新数据源中的信息。The method is also commonly used to synchronize the data source and a data listing control after information in the data source is updated. 这允许要也更新数据列表控件中的数据源中的任何更改。This allows any changes in the data source to also be updated in a data listing control. 如果数据源的通过指定控件属性，则不需要显式调用方法。If the data source for the control is specified by the property, you do not need to explicitly call the method. ASP.NET 将调用此方法会自动将绑定到指定的数据源控件控件。ASP.NET calls this method automatically to bind the specified data source control to the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义服务器控件，以便它始终会引发一个自定义中的数据绑定事件服务器控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always raises a data binding event in a custom server control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定要填充的数据源控件。Use this property to specify the source of data to populate the control. 可以是任何集合，如用于访问数据库， ，或数组，或一个对象。The can be any collection such as a for accessing databases, a , or an array, or an object. 当您将设置属性必须手动编写代码来绑定到数据源。When you set the property you must manually write the code to bind to the data source. 如果通过指定数据源属性包含多个源的数据，请使用属性来指定要绑定到控件的特定源。If the data source specified by the property contains multiple sources of data, use the property to specify the specific source to bind to the control. 例如，如果你有具有多个表，必须指定要绑定到控件的表。For example, if you have a with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control. 指定数据源后，使用方法将数据源绑定到控件。After you have specified the data source, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 或者，可以使用属性自动绑定到数据源控件所表示的数据源。Alternately, you can use the property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control. 当您将设置属性，控件自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you set the property, the control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 不需要编写代码显式调用方法动态更改的属性，除非控件。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method unless you dynamically change properties of the control. 如果两个指定值属性和属性，则 ASP.NET 将无法解析数据源和一个引发。If values are specified for both the property and the property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and a is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定的控制在页面加载时。The following example demonstrates how to specify the of the control when the page is loaded. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问数据源的属性控制控件应使用以检索其数据源。Use the property to access the property of the data source control that the control should use to retrieve its data source. 数据源引用的控件属性可以是任何实现控件接口。The data source control that is referenced by the property can be any control that implements the interface. 数据源控件必须存在相同的命名容器中引用它的控件或父控件的控件。The data source control must exist either in the same naming container as the control that references it or in a parent control of the control. 指定的值时属性，控件绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you specify a value for the property, the control binds to the specified data source control. 不需要编写代码显式调用方法。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method. 或者，可以使用属性指定的值将绑定到的源控件。Alternatively, you can use the property to specify the source of values to bind to the control. 数据源必须实现的集合接口 (如或对象) 或接口。The data source must be a collection that implements the interface (such as the or object) or the interface. 当您将设置属性时，必须编写代码来执行数据绑定。When you set the property, you must write the code to perform the data binding. 如果两个指定值并属性，则 ASP.NET 将无法解析数据源和一个引发异常。If values are specified for both the and properties, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and an exception is thrown. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性设置为属性的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to the property of a control. 加载页面时，控件绑定到指定的数据源控件和数据显示给用户。When the page is loaded, the control binds to the data source that is specified by the control and the data is displayed to the user. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用属性来确定控件是否需要调用方法绑定到其指定的数据源。The control uses the property to determine whether the control needs to call the method to bind to its specified data source. 每次 set 访问器调用任一， ，或属性更改后的数据源已调用方法、 ASP.NET 设置的值属性设置为`true`.Each time the set accessor is called on either the , , or property to change the data source after the method has already been called, ASP.NET sets the value of the property to `true`. 值属性也设置为`true`时调用方法。The value of the property is also set to `true` when the method is called. ASP.NET 设置的值属性设置为`false`后立即调用方法。ASP.NET sets the value of the property to `false` immediately after the method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来创建模板，用于控制如何显示各项之间的分隔符。Use the property to create a template that controls how the separator between items is displayed. > [!CAUTION] > 可以使用属性来显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。You can use the property to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建用于控制如何显示项之间的分隔符的模板。The following code example demonstrates how to create a template to control how separators between items are displayed.
